com.twilio.chat

Class NotificationPayload

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.twilio.chat.NotificationPayload

  • public class NotificationPayload
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper accessor for notification data payload bundle as received from Twilio Notifications. Use in `GcmListener.onMessageReceived()` implementation to retrieve Twilio-generated payload fields safely. Do not access the fields in the bundle directly - they could be modified without notice, always use this helper to access them.

      Represents payload type.
